description.english: Complete Soundcheck
description.french: Termine les balances.
description.italian: Completa il soundcheck
description.japanese: サウンドチェックを終了する
description.spanish: Completa la prueba de sonido

description.english: Play a Solo at >95% Accuracy
description.french: Joue un solo avec plus de 95 % de précision.
description.italian: Suona un assolo con precisione >95%
description.japanese: 正確さ95％以上で、ソロをプレイする
description.spanish: Toca un solo con más del 95% de precisión

displayName.english: I Learned to Play a Song
displayName.italian: Ho imparato a suonare un brano
displayName.spanish: He aprendido a tocar una canción

description.english: Achieve 100% Mastery on any song
description.french: Atteins 100 % de maîtrise sur une chanson.
description.german: Erreiche 100 % Können in einem beliebigen Song.
description.italian: Ottieni maestria 100% in un brano
description.japanese: いずれかの曲で、マスターレベル100％を達成する
description.spanish: Alcanza el 100% de dominio en cualquier canción

description.english: Achieve 100% Mastery on 10 songs
description.french: Atteins 100 % de maîtrise sur 10 chansons.
description.italian: Ottieni maestria 100% in 10 brani
description.japanese: マスターレベル100％を10曲で達成する
description.spanish: Alcanza el 100% de dominio en 10 canciones

description.english: Play Learn a Song for 10 hours
description.french: Joue pendant 10 heures dans Apprendre une chanson.
description.italian: Suona per 10 ore in Impara un brano
description.japanese: ラーン・ア・ソングを10時間プレイする
description.spanish: Toca 10 horas en Aprende una canción

description.english: Play Learn a Song for 25 hours
description.french: Joue pendant 25 heures.
description.italian: Suona per 25 ore in Impara un brano
description.japanese: ラーン・ア・ソングを25時間プレイする
description.spanish: Toca 25 horas en Aprende una canción

description.english: Complete 50 RS Recommends items
description.french: Finis 50 Recommandations Rocksmith.
description.italian: Completa 50 articoli Rocksmith raccomanda
description.japanese: Rocksmithレコメンドを50回完了する
description.spanish: Completa 50 elementos de Rocksmith recomienda

description.english: Play Rocksmith 2014 on 5 consecutive days
description.french: Joue à Rocksmith 2014 pendant 5 jours d'affilée.
description.german: Spiele Rocksmith 2014 an 5 Tagen in Folge.
description.italian: Gioca Rocksmith 2014 per 5 giorni consecutivi
description.japanese: 「Rocksmith 2014」を5日連続でプレイする
description.spanish: Juega a Rocksmith 2014 en 5 días consecutivos

displayName.french: Je sais jouer de la guitare

description.english: Hit all guitar techniques at least once
description.french: Joue toutes les techniques de guitare au moins une fois.
description.italian: Esegui correttamente tutte le tecniche per chitarra almeno una volta
description.japanese: すべてのギターテクニックの演奏に少なくとも一度、成功する
description.spanish: Toca correctamente todas las técnicas de guitarra al menos una vez

displayName.french: Je sais jouer de la basse

description.english: Hit all bass techniques at least once
description.french: Joue toutes les techniques de basse au moins une fois.
description.italian: Esegui correttamente tutte le tecniche per basso almeno una volta
description.japanese: すべてのベーステクニックの演奏に少なくとも一度、成功する
description.spanish: Toca correctamente todas las técnicas de bajo al menos una vez

description.english: Successfully play 30 unique chords
description.french: Joue 30 accords différents.
description.italian: Esegui 30 accordi diversi
description.japanese: 30個のコードの演奏に成功する
description.spanish: Toca correctamente 30 acordes distintos

displayName.english: Try It, You Might Like It

description.english: Play all Rocksmith 2014 songs at least once
description.french: Joue toutes les chansons de Rocksmith 2014 au moins une fois.
description.italian: Suona tutti i brani di Rocksmith 2014 almeno una volta
description.japanese: 「Rocksmith 2014」のすべての収録曲を、少なくとも一度プレイする
description.spanish: Toca todas las canciones de Rocksmith 2014 al menos una vez

displayName.italian: Perché non provi un altro brano?
